description:
Lock your computer while keeping your desktop visible with Transparent Lock Screen

Lock your computer while keeping your desktop visible with Transparent Lock Screen

Lock Windows Transparently, Your Way
- Lock Windows as usual
- Use a customizable hotkey
- Run a Command Prompt command

All Windows authentication methods are supported: Windows Hello (face recognition, PIN, fingerprint), password, and all sorts of MFA!

Fully featured 15-day trial
